nodes.text: The Aing-Tii were a sentient species. Their neural activity resembled the motion and reactions of the plasma within wayfinders, navigational devices used by both ancient Jedi and Sith.

In the new Star Wars canon, the Aing-Tii were first mentioned in the 2019 reference book Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker: The Visual Dictionary, written by Pablo Hidalgo. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, the Aing-Tii first appeared in the story "Galaxy's Edge," published by West End Games in 1996 as part of The Kathol Outback, a supplement for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
